title: B1 Jungle/Support main, looking for some nice folks to climb with.
body:
Hi there, 

I am a JG {{champion:254}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:131}} and SUPPORT {{champion:201}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:16}} main, but can play all roles pretty well. I am looking for some nice folks to climb with. I don't mind if you are Bronze or Diamond. This is a new account as I have been away from LoL for a while. Former account was Plat 5 at my peak.

Just shoot me a message or friend me ingame, I don't mind.

Mr Silly is my summoner name.

Happy Gaming, Thanks :)

replies.body: Hey I main jg, mid, can play all lanes except adc i was last season high silver looking for a duo IGN: deucalion1

Hey there. I am the leader of my group. I was gold almost platinum in season 6. Although I have not play for couple months, but still can carry my team. Although our jg is quiet new for this game, but that won't be awful. I am still training him to be a god jg. We are willing to have you as our friend. add JLYFireGod, if you have any problem. I will sure text you back. Normally we play at midnight. It is much more challenge. Since old players start at this time. That is why I believe I can boost my jg up.
B4 bot supp mid Im alwyas down to climb DiacteylMorphine

Hiya :)

I'm a Bronze 5 Jungle {{champion:28}} {{champion:121}}  and Mid {{champion:1}} {{champion:61}}  main, but can also play in Top and Support roles if necessary :)

Hey mate,

Im currently in b4 myself having a tough time getting higher. Im an ADC/Mid main I can play every ADC with a decent level of confidence and my mid pool is a bit light. Im not toxic and I don't rage. If you want someone chill to climb with, look no further.

Hit me up in game if you want to play, im 25 and mature.
